MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G42 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Sinclair Drive and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have carried out investigation work and determined an underground cable fault on Battlefield Road. Due to the complexity of the repairs required,  we now expect your supply to be restored by 11pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:05pm on 15th December 2020.
